plot: The girls head off to Bora Bora to investigate the strange 'blob creatures' that have emerged from the ocean and literally sucked the memory out of the heads of the world's top ten scientists.
title: "Totally Spies!" The Eraser
plot_es: The girls head off to Bora Bora to investigate the strange 'blob creatures' that have emerged from the ocean and literally sucked the memory out of the heads of the world's top ten scientists.
plot_en: The girls head off to Bora Bora to investigate the strange 'blob creatures' that have emerged from the ocean and literally sucked the memory out of the heads of the world's top ten scientists.
